########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${FEC_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${FEC_LIBRARY_DIRS} ${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

list(APPEND sss1_sources
    ax_100_decode_impl.cc
)

set(sss1_sources "${sss1_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT sss1_sources)
	MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
	return()
endif(NOT sss1_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-sss1 SHARED ${sss1_sources})
#target_link_libraries(gnuradio-sss1 gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-sss1 ${FEC_LIBRARIES} ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})
set_target_properties(gnuradio-sss1 PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_sss1_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-sss1 PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-sss1 RUNTIME_COMPONENT "sss1_runtime" DEVEL_COMPONENT "sss1_devel")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
#include(GrTest)
#
#include_directories(${CPPUNIT_INCLUDE_DIRS})
#
#list(APPEND test_sss1_sources
#    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test_sss1.cc
#    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_sss1.cc
#)
#
#add_executable(test-sss1 ${test_sss1_sources})
#
#target_link_libraries(
#  test-sss1
#  ${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_LIBRARIES}
#  ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
#  ${CPPUNIT_LIBRARIES}
#  gnuradio-sss1
#)

#GR_ADD_TEST(test_sss1 test-sss1)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")
